dataPrivacySecurity.dataPrivacySecurity: To prevent unauthorized access, we use the technical and legal data protection measures described in sections 7 and 9a. - We also strive to ensure that the information posted on the site is reliable and up-to-date. However, we understand that there is a risk of misinformation due to the fact that changes are made to legislative acts from time to time, modules may be updated. In this regard, firstly, the site administrator monitors legislation once a month for changes and, if necessary, updates regulatory legal acts on the portal. We collect and use personal data exclusively for the purposes specified in the privacy policy: to combat spam and protect users from insults and hate speech, as well as to maintain contact with users, in particular to send notifications, requests, responses regarding the use of the portal, the provision of services, processing requests and requests from users. We restrict access to personal information for our employees, contractors and agents. Personal data of users is accumulated in the admin panel in the "Users" tab, which only the administrator and the programmer have access to. We impose contractual obligations on the administrator: in the Agreement on the confidentiality of personal data signed by the administrator, it is stated that for violation of the confidentiality of personal data, the administrator undertakes to compensate for the losses incurred by the subject of personal data in connection with the dissemination of personal data. data, in accordance with the current legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan. Similar agreements will be concluded with all employees who have access to users' personal data. In addition, we use technical means of data protection (connection of an SSL certificate, use of the OAuth2 standard, access rights) mentioned in Section 7.

privacy.privacyCompliance: When working with users' personal data, our project is guided by the following laws: Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan dated May 21, 2013 No. 94-V "On Personal data and their protection". The Constitution of the Republic of Kazakhstan. Kazakhstan dated August 30, 1995, which proclaims that everyone has the right to inviolability of private life and protection of private and family secrets. The Law "On Informatization" of November 24, 2015, which provides for measures to prevent illegal access to digital information. "On Approval of the Regulations on the Procedure for collecting and Processing Personal Data", Order No. 395/NK of the Minister of Digital Development, Innovation and Aerospace Industry of the Republic of Kazakhstan dated October 21, 2020. To collect personal data, we request the user's consent to the collection and processing of his personal data during registration/authorization. If the user logs in or registers on the website, he automatically agrees to the collection and processing of data. We ensure the confidentiality of users' personal data, observing the requirement not to allow their dissemination without the user's consent or other legal grounds. To prevent unauthorized access to data, we take legal and technical measures to protect the information system. The measures of legal protection include an agreement on the confidentiality of personal data concluded by the owner of the information system, which establishes the working conditions, access and use of personal data, as well as responsibility for their violation. Technical measures include the use of information security tools: an SSL certificate is connected to our site. This ensures a secure connection between the user's browser and the server. When using the SSL protocol, information is transmitted encrypted over HTTPS and can only be decrypted using a special key, unlike the usual HTTP protocol. For authorization via social networks, the OAuth2 standard is used as a special means of protecting accounts. Access rights: This includes assigning the roles "administrator" and "user" and the ability to access users' personal data only by logging in using the password of the administrator account.
